attributionColor.comment: The text color for the source attribution line expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
backgroundColor.comment: The background color of the image expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
bigTextEnabled.comment: Indicates whether the current price should be displayed in large mode in the middle instead of at bottom of image
bigTextOnTopEnabled.comment: If bigTextEnabled is true, this controls whether the price rendered below visual graph or above it in z-order
fiatUnit.comment: The three letter fiat currency unit for value comparisons
headerColor.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecial color specifier
height.comment: The height, in pixels to generate the image.
interval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before data gathering and image creation again
priceDownColor.comment: The color of the text for the current price when declining expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
priceShadowColor.comment: The color of the text shadow for the current price expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
priceUpColor.comment: The color of the text for the current price when rising expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
priceUrl.comment: The url that provides the pricing information from bisq marketplace
useTor.comment: Indicates whether remote calls should use tor socks proxy for privacy.
width.comment: The width, in pixels to generate the image.
